titles.title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to repeal provisions establishing a national maximum speed limit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

bill.summary: 3/29/1993--Introduced. Repeals provisions establishing a national maximum speed limit.
